Sample.Title: A React & Redux single-page application authorizing an ASP.NET Core Web API to call MS Graph API on its behalf using the MS Graph SDK

ManualSteps.Comment: Navigate to the Authentication blade, click 'Add a platform', choose 'Web' and register your return uri i.e. http://localhost:3000, then enable 'implicit flow'
Navigate to the Expose an API blade and change the Application ID URI to use the https pattern. i.e. https://<tenant_domain>/<app_name>
Navigate to the Manifest page and change 'signInAudience' to 'AzureADandPersonalMicrosoftAccount'.
Navigate to the Manifest page and change 'accessTokenAcceptedVersion' to 2.

Mappings.key: Enter the TodoList Web APIs base address, e.g. 'https://localhost:44351/api/todolist/'
Enter the API scopes as declared in the app registration 'Expose an Api' blade in the form of 'api://{clientId}/access_as_user'
